rules.natural: Provided that authorization "auth001" was reviewed in period "period001", then it is valid for that period.

Under the condition that a mandatory review of authorization "auth001" is required for period "period001", then if its review was completed by person "person001", it follows that authorization "auth001" was reviewed in that period.
Whenever the compliance of person "person001" with condition "condition001" is verified, then person "person001" meets that compliance condition.

If verification for person "person001" regarding condition "condition001" is complete, then given that legislation "leg001" was enacted in period "period001", the compliance of person "person001" with condition "condition001" is verified.
Provided that an automated verification was performed for person "person001" regarding condition "condition001", then verification for that person and condition is complete.
Either an automated verification was performed for person "person001" regarding condition "condition001", or a manual verification was performed.
Whenever a manual verification was performed for person "person001" regarding condition "condition001", supervisory approval was granted for that person and condition.
If supervisory approval was granted for person "person001" regarding condition "condition001", then verification for that person and condition is complete.
Under the condition that person "person001" meets compliance condition "condition001", then authorization "auth001" is valid for period "period001".
Whenever an expedited review is requested by person "person001" for legislation "leg001", a standard procedure was initiated by that person for that legislation.

If a crisis was declared for period "period001", then should an emergency procedure be initiated by person "person001" for legislation "leg001", it follows that an expedited review was requested by that person for that legislation.
Either a crisis was declared for period "period001", or a deadline is imminent in that period.

rules.prover9_expression: (compliance_audit_scheduled(period001) -> (-(-(deadline_imminent(period001) -> (emergency_procedure_initiated(person001, leg001) -> expedited_review_requested(person001, leg001))) -> extension_granted(person001, period001)) -> -sanctions_imposed(person001, leg001)))
rules.natural: Provided a compliance audit is scheduled for period "period001", then if it is not the case that (whenever a deadline is imminent, an emergency procedure initiation leads to an expedited review request) implies an extension was granted to person "person001", it follows that sanctions were not imposed on that person under legislation "leg001".

Under the condition that a grace period is active for period "period001", then if full authorization "auth001" was not granted to person "person001", person "person001" meets compliance condition "condition001".
Whenever legislation "leg001" was enacted in period "period001", condition "condition001" is satisfied by that legislation.
Either person "person001" is authorized for "auth001", or that person holds provisional authorization for it.
Provided that person "person001" holds provisional authorization for "auth001", then full authorization "auth001" was granted to that person.

rules.natural: Should it be false that (an exemption was applied or legislation enactment implies compliance is met), then an emergency procedure was initiated by person "person001" for legislation "leg001".
Whenever it is not the case that (an exemption was applied or legislation enactment implies compliance is met), a standard procedure was not initiated by person "person001" for legislation "leg001".

Under the condition that it is false that (condition satisfaction implies compliance is met), an exception was not granted to person "person001" regarding legislation "leg001".
Should it be that (authorization implies full authorization granted) is not true, then an appeal was filed by person "person001" regarding authorization "auth001".
If it is not the case that (an appeal was approved or no appeal was filed), then a penalty was assessed against person "person001" under legislation "leg001".
